msg: found a reasonably nice animated radio tower icon, gotta love Google.

author: psmith
msg: notify the statusBar that an event has arrived.

author: psmith
msg: added a little "Receiving..." label in the status bar, which appears
when a new event in any tab is received, and disappears after 5 seconds
if no more events are received.  The text will eventually be replaced
with a nice little Radio tower animated icon, as soon as I can con
someone with design skills to make it.

author: psmith
msg: changed the way the default L&F is initiated
notified the status bar when a new tab is created.
Also update the currently selected row in the status bar.
Tried to get the Detail pane to set the caret Position to 0, to force it to
show the information at the start of the scroll pane, and it does do this
but a second or so later, scrolls back to the bottom.  Weird.
